Support us

We're an independent, charitable organisation which has kept all Suffolk’s 44 libraries open, even though our budget has been reduced by a third since 2012. Help us carry on making life in Suffolk better.

Donate

You can donate online or by sending a text message. If you’re representing an organisation that would like to support us, contact our business development manager nikki.hulse@suffolklibraries.co.uk

How to donate

Use our Golden Giving service to make an online donation:

Single donation
Regular donation

Use our Text Giving service (all texts incur a charge at your standard message rate):

  • Text 1LIBRARY to 70085 to donate £1
  • Text 5LIBRARY to 70085 to donate £5
  • Text 10LIBRARY to 70085 to donate £10

Volunteer

Rewarding volunteering opportunities for people of all ages. Strengthen your local community, meet new people and improve your CV by learning or sharing skills.

Find out about volunteering →

Library community groups

Join your local library's community group and help run events and raise funds while making new friends.

Join your library community group →

Suffolk Libraries Extra

Our membership scheme for individuals and organisations. Unique access to exclusive competitions, our early newsletter with the latest releases and, at some tiers, a mention in our annual report.

Become an Extra member →

Our corporate supporters

Our libraries receive over 3 million visits every year. If you run a local business and are interested in working with or supporting us, email nikki.hulse@suffolklibraries.co.uk

We're very grateful to the following organisations for their support:
